name: boteco-website
description: This repository contains the static files for the Boteco restaurant website.

scripts.minify:css: postcss assets/css/boteco_style.css -o assets/css/boteco_style.prefixed.css && cleancss -o assets/css/boteco_style.min.css assets/css/boteco_style.prefixed.css
scripts.minify:js: bash -c 'for file in assets/js/*.js; do [[ "$file" == *.min.js ]] && continue; uglifyjs "$file" -c -m -o "${file%.js}.min.js"; done'

author: Boteco
